content: I don't suppose we've found anyone to volunteer to write reference documentation?

Not that I'm aware of - do we have a list of exact todos for this? Perhaps if the task was clearer (since I think most people don't have a good grasp on what the reference actually includes) we might have more success finding someone

There are some issues here: https://github.com/rust-lang/reference/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3AA-edition-2021

I tried to add instructions to each one on what to do. I think most of them should be pretty simple. Unfortunately, I can't approve my own PRs, so if I write them we somehow need to find someone willing to review them (which means someone on the lang team), and I haven't had much success with that in the past.
Someone is already working on disjoint captures.
I can tackle this starting this weekend, if needs be :smile:
